        public static boolean exists(String dir)
        Check if a directory existss
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory to check
        Returns:
        true if the dir exists on the file system

           File newf)
        A wrapper for File.renameTo(File)
        Parameters:
        oldf - the original filename
        newf - the new filename
        Returns:
        true if the move was successful

      • move

        public static boolean move(String oldf,
           String newf)
        A wrapper for File.renameTo(File) which creates new File handles for both args.
        Parameters:
        oldf - the original filename
        newf - the new filename
        Returns:
        true if the move was successful

        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful

        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful

      • mkUserDir

        public static String mkUserDir(YADARequest yadaReq)
                        throws YADAResourceException
        Calls mkUserDir(String) with the current user value
        Parameters:
        yadaReq - YADA request configuration
        Returns:
        the new directory path
        Throws:
        YADAResourceException - when the YADA output directory cannot be found

      • mkUserDir

        public static String mkUserDir(String user)
                        throws YADAResourceException
        Creates a directory name user in io/out
        Parameters:
        user - the user id to use for the name of the new directory
        Returns:
        the new directory path
        Throws:
        YADAResourceException - when the YADA output directory cannot be found

                              throws YADAResourceException
        Returns the path relative to app_home
        Parameters:
        path - the app_home subdirectory path
        Returns:
        the path from app_home
        Throws:
        YADAResourceException - when the path to app_home cannot be found

      • getFileList

        public static List<File> getFileList(File d,
                     int depth)
        Gets a recursive list of directory contents
        Parameters:
        d - the directory to interrogate
        depth - the number of level to recurse
        Returns:
        a list of directory contents

      • getText

        public static String getText(File f)
                      throws YADAResourceException,
                             YADAIOException
        Retrieves the requested file from the filesystem and returns it's content as a String
        Parameters:
        f - the file from which content is desired
        Returns:
        String containing the contents of the file f
        Throws:
        YADAResourceException - when the requested file can't be found
        YADAIOException - when the requested content can't be read
        Since:
        5.0.1
